what about﻿ cats???

Did anyone else look up 0:51﻿ like me...?
aww﻿ so cute puppies :D
Was that dog eating the babys poop?﻿ 0:09
Yeah just saw my dog licking pee out of the﻿ kids potty. Great product.
i﻿ like the pug when i clicked this video lawl.

that stuff will probably make my﻿ dog fart

ewwwwwwwwwwww ﻿

"The kind of sponges﻿ surgeons use before they cut you open" Me: O_O
yeah it's﻿ nasty!!!!
thumbs up i you wanted﻿ to see the dog has the thumbnail
whos the idiot who says dogs have cleaner mouths? thats a﻿ load of bullishit lol

dog looks tasty﻿

Reviewer.Books: 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Christian Bible, Feeling Good, Lullaby, Fight Club.
Primarily Autobiographies and Biographies with a sprinkling of Stephen King now and then
Reviewer.Movies: The Boat That Rocked, Love Actually, Limitless, The Elephant in the Living Room, Hachiko: A Dog's Story, Secondhand Lions, Festival Express, Still Crazy, Fast Times at Ridgemont High, Harry and Tonto, Harold and Maude [for a start]
Reviewer.Music: Little Feat, John Hiatt, Red Dress, Sonny Landreth, Jimi Hendrix, Collective Soul, Counting Crows, Ian Siegal, Elvis Costello, Grace Potter and the Nocturnals, PK Dwyer, Flight of the Conchords, Shaun Murphy, The Band and the Beatles [to name but a few]
